name: Monster Mayhem
description: Collect and battle terrifying creatures from myth and legend

cards.title: Kraken
cards.description: Massive cephalopod terrorizing the seas
cards.imageDescription: Giant tentacled sea monster emerging from ocean waves, ships in the background
cards.effect: On summon: +2 HP to all champions; Passive: Cannot be targeted by opponent events
cards.flavor: From the depths, it rises.

cards.title: Sudden Ambush
cards.description: Strike when your enemy least expects it
cards.imageDescription: Monster leaping from shadows to attack an unsuspecting victim
cards.effect: Deal 4 damage to target champion, then draw 1 card
cards.flavor: The best offense is a good surprise.

cards.title: Terrifying Roar
cards.description: Unleash a fearsome roar that shakes the ground
cards.imageDescription: Large monster with mouth open wide, sound waves visible, smaller creatures fleeing
cards.effect: All opponent champions lose 1 MP regeneration this turn
cards.flavor: Some monsters don't need weapons - their presence is weapon enough.

cards.title: Full Moon
cards.description: The moon's power strengthens supernatural creatures
cards.imageDescription: Large full moon in a night sky, casting silver light over a landscape
cards.effect: All monster champions gain +2 damage this turn
cards.flavor: When the moon is full, the darkness grows stronger.

cards.title: Basilisk
cards.description: Serpentine creature whose gaze turns flesh to stone
cards.imageDescription: Large snake-like creature with glowing eyes, stone statues in the background
cards.effect: On summon: opponent discards 1 card; Passive: Opponent creatures cost 1 more HP to play
cards.flavor: One look is all it takes.

cards.title: Claw Swipe
cards.description: Rake your enemies with razor-sharp claws
cards.imageDescription: Monster with large claws swiping at an opponent, claws glowing
cards.effect: Deal 1 damage to target champion, +1 damage if you have a monster champion in play
cards.flavor: Nature's weapons are often the most effective.

cards.title: Wolf Pack
cards.description: A pack of hungry wolves that hunt together
cards.imageDescription: Three wolves with glowing eyes, surrounding prey in a forest clearing
cards.effect: When attacking: Deal 1 damage to target, +1 damage if played during night phase
cards.flavor: There's strength in numbers, especially when those numbers have sharp teeth.

cards.title: Ancient Wyrm
cards.description: A massive dragon-like creature with scales that shimmer like oil
cards.imageDescription: Huge serpentine dragon with iridescent scales, coiled around a mountain peak
cards.effect: On summon: Deal 2 damage to all enemy creatures; Passive: Gain 1 MP each turn
cards.flavor: Older than memory, hungrier than time.

cards.title: Haunted Spirit
cards.description: A vengeful spirit bound to the mortal realm for a limited time
cards.imageDescription: Ghostly figure with glowing eyes, chained to an ancient tomb
cards.effect: On summon: Deal 1 damage to all opponent champions; When attacking: Deal 2 damage to target
cards.flavor: Time is my prison, vengeance is my freedom.

cards.title: Ancient Kraken
cards.description: A primordial sea monster of unimaginable size and power, awakened from the deepest ocean trenches
cards.imageDescription: Massive tentacled sea monster emerging from dark ocean depths, with glowing eyes and bioluminescent patterns
cards.effect: On summon: Deal 4 damage to all enemies; Passive: Gain 1 HP at the start of each turn; When attacking: +2 damage if MP >= 3
cards.flavor: Older than the mountains, deeper than the abyss, and hungrier than death itself.

cards.title: Leviathan
cards.description: An ancient sea deity of unimaginable power that commands the very waters themselves
cards.imageDescription: Massive serpentine sea monster with multiple heads, coiled around a sinking ship in stormy seas
cards.effect: On summon: Deal 5 damage to all enemies; Passive: All water-themed cards cost 1 less MP; When attacking: +3 damage if MP >= 4
cards.flavor: In the beginning, there was only water... and Leviathan.

cards.title: Behemoth
cards.description: A colossal land monster of biblical proportions whose footsteps shake the earth
cards.imageDescription: Gigantic beast with multiple eyes and horns, standing atop a mountain peak, clouds swirling around
cards.effect: On summon: All enemy champions lose 2 MP regeneration; Passive: Cannot be targeted by damage effects under 3; When attacking: Deal 2 damage to all opponents
cards.flavor: The earth trembles at its approach, the sky darkens in its shadow.

cards.title: Dracolich
cards.description: An undead dragon that has transcended death itself, wielding both draconic power and necromancy
cards.imageDescription: Massive skeletal dragon with ghostly flames, perched on a throne of bones in a cursed crypt
cards.effect: On summon: Return 2 creature cards from your discard to your hand; Passive: Gain 1 MP at the start of each turn; When attacking: +2 damage if you control a creature
cards.flavor: Death could not contain the dragon's hunger for power.

cards.title: The Abomination
cards.description: A twisted fusion of multiple creatures, a horror beyond comprehension born from dark experiments
cards.imageDescription: Grotesque hybrid creature with multiple limbs and heads, surrounded by dark magical energy in a laboratory
cards.effect: On summon: Add 2 random rare monster cards to your hand; Passive: When you play a creature, gain 1 HP; When attacking: Deal 1 damage to all enemies
cards.flavor: Science and madness combined to create the impossible.

cards.title: Void Spawn
cards.description: A creature from beyond reality that feeds on the essence of existence itself
cards.imageDescription: Ethereal tentacled horror with glowing void eyes, emerging from a rift in space with stars being consumed behind it
cards.effect: On summon: Discard all cards in your hand, then draw 4 cards; Passive: Your hand size limit is increased by 2; When attacking: Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your hand
cards.flavor: It exists where existence ends, and it hungers for what lies between.

cards.title: Ancient Beholder
cards.description: A massive floating eye with numerous smaller eyes on stalks, each casting different spells
cards.imageDescription: Huge floating eyeball with multiple smaller eyes on tentacles, surrounded by magical auras
cards.effect: On summon: Add 2 random spell cards to your hand; Passive: +1 card per turn; When attacking: Deal 1 damage to all opponents
cards.flavor: I see all, I know all, and soon... I shall consume all.

cards.title: Elder Basilisk
cards.description: An ancient basilisk whose gaze can turn entire armies to stone
cards.imageDescription: Massive serpent-like creature with crystalline scales, stone statues scattered around
cards.effect: On summon: opponent discards 2 cards; Passive: Opponent creatures cost 2 more HP to play; When attacking: Deal 2 damage to target
cards.flavor: Age has only made its power more terrible.

cards.title: Monstrous Rage
cards.description: Unleash the primal fury that dwells within all creatures
cards.imageDescription: Beast with glowing red eyes, muscles bulging with rage and power
cards.effect: All your champions gain +3 damage this turn, but lose 1 HP
cards.flavor: Sometimes the only way to win is to abandon reason entirely.

cards.title: Acid Spit
cards.description: Spit corrosive acid that burns through armor and flesh alike
cards.imageDescription: Monster spitting glowing green acid that dissolves metal and stone
cards.effect: Deal 3 damage to target champion, +1 damage if you control a creature
cards.flavor: The acid burns not just the body, but the soul itself.

cards.title: Blood Moon
cards.description: A crimson moon rises, empowering dark creatures and weakening the light
cards.imageDescription: Large red moon in a dark sky, casting bloody light over a haunted landscape
cards.effect: All monster champions gain +1 damage, all non-monster champions lose 1 MP regeneration
cards.flavor: When the moon bleeds, the darkness grows stronger.

cards.title: Shadow Stalker
cards.description: A creature that moves through darkness, striking from the unseen void
cards.imageDescription: Shadowy figure with glowing red eyes, blending into darkness with claws ready
cards.effect: When attacking: Deal 2 damage to target; Passive: Cannot be targeted by opponent events; On summon: Gain 1 MP
cards.flavor: Fear the darkness, for it fears nothing in return.

cards.title: Venomous Bite
cards.description: Sink razor-sharp fangs into your enemy, injecting deadly poison
cards.imageDescription: Monster with long fangs sinking teeth into an opponent, green venom dripping
cards.effect: Deal 1 damage to target champion, opponent loses 1 MP regeneration next turn
cards.flavor: The bite is just the beginning of the suffering.

cards.title: Claw Frenzy
cards.description: A wild flurry of slashing claws that tears through defenses
cards.imageDescription: Monster with multiple claws slashing wildly at multiple opponents
cards.effect: Deal 2 damage to target champion, +1 damage if you have a monster champion in play
cards.flavor: When claws meet flesh, only the strongest survive.

cards.title: Terrifying Howl
cards.description: A bone-chilling howl that freezes the blood and weakens the resolve
cards.imageDescription: Monster with mouth open wide, sound waves visible, opponents looking fearful
cards.effect: All opponent champions lose 1 MP regeneration this turn
cards.flavor: Some sounds are so terrible they echo in your nightmares forever.

cards.title: Swarm Attack
cards.description: Call forth a horde of smaller creatures to overwhelm your enemies
cards.imageDescription: Swarm of small monsters attacking in a coordinated group assault
cards.effect: Deal 1 damage to all opponent champions
cards.flavor: Numbers have their own kind of strength.

cards.title: Giant Rat
cards.description: An oversized rodent that scavenges in the shadows and spreads disease
cards.imageDescription: Massive rat with glowing red eyes, crawling through dark tunnels
cards.effect: When attacking: Deal 1 damage to target; Passive: Gain 1 MP each turn
cards.flavor: Small, numerous, and surprisingly dangerous.

cards.title: Carrion Feeder
cards.description: A scavenger that grows stronger with each fallen foe
cards.imageDescription: Vulture-like creature feeding on remains, growing larger and more menacing
cards.effect: When attacking: Deal 1 damage to target; On summon: Gain 1 HP for each creature in your discard pile
cards.flavor: Death feeds it, and it feeds on death.

cards.title: Bone Golem
cards.description: A construct made from the bones of the fallen, animated by dark magic
cards.imageDescription: Skeleton golem made of various bones, glowing with necromantic energy
cards.effect: When attacking: Deal 2 damage to target; Passive: Cannot be targeted by healing effects
cards.flavor: Built from death, sustained by death, empowered by death.

cards.title: Mist Wraith
cards.description: A ghostly apparition that emerges from fog to drain the life force of the living
cards.imageDescription: Ethereal ghostly figure emerging from thick mist, reaching out with spectral hands
cards.effect: When attacking: Deal 1 damage to target, restore 1 HP to yourself
cards.flavor: It comes with the fog and leaves only sorrow behind.

cards.title: Spider Brood
cards.description: A cluster of smaller spiders that attack in coordinated swarms
cards.imageDescription: Group of large spiders moving in formation, webs glistening in the dark
cards.effect: When attacking: Deal 1 damage to target, +1 damage if played during night phase
cards.flavor: In the dark, they are everywhere at once.

cards.title: Poison Cloud
cards.description: Release a toxic cloud that sickens all who breathe it
cards.imageDescription: Green toxic cloud spreading across a battlefield, figures coughing and staggering
cards.effect: All champions lose 1 MP regeneration this turn, opponent discards 1 card
cards.flavor: The air itself becomes a weapon.
